channel.title: VM Internet Connection Speed
channel.description: I'm running host>vpn>whonixgateway>os My internet speed connection drops to almost 10% of my host connection speed while running whonixgateway in my os Is there any solution to this? Or at least to improve a better internet speed connection?

item.title: VM Internet Connection Speed
item.dc:creator: unman
item.description:
I’m running host>vpn>whonixgateway>os
My internet speed connection drops to almost 10% of my host connection speed while running whonixgateway in my os
Is there any solution to this?
Or at least to improve a better internet speed connection?

Whonix-gateway routes your traffic though the Tor network.
You might like to read this, in the Tor FAQ -
https://www.torproject.org/docs/faq.html.en#WhySlow

Basically, it’s a trade off you have to accept.

Read full topic
